titleStmt.title: The infallible true and assured vvitch, or, The second edition of the tryall of witch-craft shevving the right and true methode of the discoverie : with a confutation of erroneous waies, carefully reviewed and more fully cleared and augmented / by Iohn Cotta ...
titleStmt.author: Cotta, John, 1575?-1650?
Marlborough, James Ley, Earl of, 1550-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.E. for R.H. and are to be sold at the signe of the Grey-hound in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Engraved frontispiece of Sir James Ley opposite t.p.
Errors in paging: p. 71-72 and 83-84 printed twice.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
